org.seedstack.seed.security

Class Role

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.seed.security.Role
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Role
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a Role and optionally a collection of scopes on which it is given. This scope must be given to all the permissions this role grants.
    See Also:
